title: Minimal Stock Market Activity
description: In 2021, Barbados recorded a total stock trade value of $220,000, one of the lowest in the world, indicating limited market activity.

title: Low Social Contributions
description: Barbados reported social contributions amounting to 239,182 local currency units in 2016, reflecting a minimal level of social funding.

title: Scarce Industrial Design Applications
description: In 2017, Barbados had only 1 resident industrial design application, highlighting a lack of innovation and design activity.
